detail_text: Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Oily✔ Combination✔ Dry✔ SensitiveWhat it is:A multitasking beauty oil with 23-karat gold for face, hair, and body that adds instant nourishment and radiance to your skincare and makeup routine.Solutions for:- Dryness- Fine lines and wrinkles- Dullness and uneven skintoneIf you want to know more…This soothing oil is made from the extra extra virgin Japanese camellia that grow on the Goto Islands. The seeds are cold-pressed to extract the essential oil and retain its full benefits. This oil is naturally rich in antioxidants and essential fatty acids to nourish and help seal in moisture. It absorbs quickly and thoroughly because its molecular weight is an almost identical match for skin. Crushed 23-karat gold flakes leave a subtle gleam on skin, and Infused licorice extract gently calms and helps to reduce visible redness. Hadasei-3 Complex, Tatcha’s proprietary trio of Japanese anti-aging superfoodsgreen tea, rice, and algaevisibly restores healthy-looking, youthful radiance.What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- PhthalatesWhat else you need to know: For 2,000 years, camellia oil has been treasured by geisha and Japanese women because of how it nourishes skin, leaving it glowing but never oily. They learned of its incredible benefits from Ama, Japanese female free divers who spend four hours a day, every day harvesting treasures from the sea wearing only a loin cloth. To protect their skin and hair from the salty, cold ocean water, they coat their skin with camellia oil. This beauty secret has been advanced for the lips by the Tatcha Institute in Japan with the Gold Camellia Beauty Oil.This product is non-irritating, non-sensitizing, dermatologist tested, and cruelty-free. It is formulated without mineral oil, synthetic fragrances, sulfate detergents, urea, DEA, or TEA. Beauty that gives back: Your purchase of a full-sized Tatcha skincare item will fund a day of school for incredible girls through thier Beautiful Faces, Beautiful Futures partnership with Room to Read.

name: Golden Krocus Ageless Saffron Elixir Serum
detail_text: Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Oily✔ Combination✔ Dry✔ Sensitive What it is:A precious golden elixir infused with the immense antioxidant power of one-day fresh Greek saffron to universally correct all visible signs of aging. Solutions for:- Fine lines/wrinkles- Uneven skin tone and discoloration - Loss of firmness/elasticity If you want to know more…In the Greek town of Kozani, lush krocus flowers bloom only once per year and produce the highest quality organic saffron in the worlda potent spice more precious than gold. Korres extracts the full power of this hand-picked, one-day fresh saffron at its maximum antioxidant levels and combines it with beta-glucans, peptides, and amino acids to create this elixir that strengthens skin’s resistance to daily damage. A complex of amino acids, polysaccharides, and copper supports natural collagen production to help visibly firm and lift skin while reducing the appearance of wrinkles. Low molecular weight hyaluronic acid easily and deeply penetrates the skin to smooth, plump, and brighten. Much more than your typical serum, this universal and powerful booster repairs all visible signs of aging for all skin types and concerns. Experience a few golden drops every day for youthful-looking, glowing skin. What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- Phthalates What else you need to know:It takes 70,000 krocus flowerswhich bloom only once per year for two weeksto produce just one pound of Greek saffron. Each flower is hand-picked and the three delicate red saffron stigmas are hand-separated to preserve the potent antioxidant properties of this rare and precious spice. The unused parts of the flowers are returned to soil as organic fertilizer for the following year’s harvest, making this a zero waste, sustainable operation. The elixir is 94.9 percent natural and like all Korres formulations, it is made without petrolatum, mineral oil, silicones, propylene glycol, and ethanolamines. Research results:In a 2-week consumer use test: - 97% reported improved skin suppleness, elasticity, and overall health - 94% reported improved skin firmness - 91% reported improved performance of their existing skin care routine - 91% reported lifted skin - 91% reported even skin tone and texture In a 4-week consumer use test: - 91% reported that all signs of aging were minimized

By infusing salicylic acid into clarifying oils (like tea tree oil and black cumin seed oil), the drying effects of salicylic acid are nipped in the bud, while all of the treatment aspects (like clearing congested pores and managing blackheads and blemishes) are in full-force. This product is noncomedogenic and vegan. Drunk Elephant only use clean, non-toxic ingredients that either directly benefit the skin’s health or support the integrity and effectiveness of their formulations. You won’t find silicones, chemical screens, sensitizing colorants, perfumes, or fragrant essential oils of any kind in their products, making them appropriate for every skin type. Hydration plumps and smooths skin so makeup goes on better and more evenly, and it helps reduce dry spots that can make makeup look flaky on the skin. name: Crème Ancienne®
detail_text: Which skin type is it good for? ✔ Normal ✔ Oily ✔ Combination ✔ Dry ✔ Sensitive What it is: A luxurious face treatment that smooths the appearance of wrinkles and provides ultimate nourishment with oils hand-blended in a monastery. Handmade in a monastery, this ultra-effective formula is proven to reduce the appearance of wrinkles in depth and length, providing a significant, anti-oxidative effect for 24 hoursdelivering instant and long-lasting hydration. The face cream is hand-blended with meadowfoam seed oil, a unique fatty acid absorbed by the skin to provide the ultimate nourishment. A dose of vitamin E provides antioxidant protection against wrinkle-causing free radicals, while chamomile wax decreases dry spots, softens the skin, and imparts a light moisture-preserving veil. What it is formulated WITHOUT: - Parabens - Sulfates - Phthalates What else you need to know: "Inspired by the world's first cream, Crème Ancienne contains such fragile ingredients that each must be poured in a particular sequence at a specific dose at a determined temperature all in perfect balancerequirements that can only be met by hand. We turned to a monastery to hand-blend each jar because monks are an important part of the cream's heritage. Historically, if a formula was not produced by a monk, it was considered witchcraft. Without them, the original formula would not exist today."Lev Glazman and Alina Roytberg, Fresh Co-founders Research results: In-vivo test: - Proven to have a significant moisturizing effect for 28 hours - Proven to have a significant anti-oxidative effect for 24 hours - Proven to have an immediate smoothing effect on wrinkles - 97% felt it moisturized and prevented dry skin - 90% noticed a nourishing effect

name: Umbrian Clay Purifying Mask
detail_text: Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Oily✔ Combination✔ Dry✔ Sensitive What it is: A triple-threat clay treatment that can be used as a mask to instantly purify skin, a daily deep cleanser, or a spot treatment to minimize imperfections.Solutions for:- Pores - Blemishes - OilinessIf you want to know more…Perfect for all skin types, Umbrian Clay is a gentle, three-in-one treatment that can also be used as a daily deep cleanser or to minimize imperfections. Umbrian clay, Fresh’s proprietary ingredient, has a high mineral content that works to balance, purify, and clarify the complexion. What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- Phthalates What else you need to know:This mask is noncomedogenic. "Tucked away on the top of a hill in central Italy is a small gem of a town called Nocera Umbra. I traveled to this picturesque village almost 18 years ago to discover their hidden secretUmbrian clay, an ultra-fine, mineral-rich clay. This unique clay has been around for centuries and was even used by the ancient Etruscans for its array of benefits. I have been impressed with its versatility and high level of effectiveness ever since my first visit. This multitasking treatment features Umbrian clay, which I call a ‘miracle ingredient.’ I can’t live without this one-of-a-kind mask, which one can always find it in my cosmetic bag. It is one of my favorite treatments because of its versatility and how I can pair it with other products like Soy Face Cleanser and Rose Face Mask. Ideal for all skin types, this mask deeply cleanses, purifies, and significantly reduces the appearance of pores. I also use the formula as spot treatment to minimize small imperfections without drying the skin for a balanced, healthy-looking complexion."Lev Glazman, Fresh Co-founder Beauty tips: - Following a day of heavy makeup, use this gentle face mask after cleansing to purify the skin for a super clean, healthy feeling. - For a deep cleanse, start with Fresh Soy Face Cleanser to remove impurities and makeup. Rinse. Massage Umbrian Clay Purifying Mask onto face for 30 seconds, then remove with warm water. - To prep your skin before binge-masking or applying masks back-to-back, balance and purify your skin first with Umbrian Clay Purifying Mask. Apply the charcoal-toned face mask on cleansed skin and rinse off after three to five minutes before starting your multi-masking experience. We spent a few years researching the natural ingredient and introduced soy to the beauty market in 1999. As our first venture into skin care, the Soy Collection continues to hold a special place in our hearts."Lev Glazman and Alina Roytberg, Fresh FoundersResearch results:In an in-vivo test: - 97% reported more supple skin- 93% said it soothed and softened their skin - 90% said their skin was balanced and healthy-looking - 86% felt it visibly improved the appearance of the skin - 86% felt it left their skin toned and radiant Beauty tips:- To remove heavy makeup, apply Soy Face Cleanser on dry skin. Wipe off with wet cotton rounds, and rinse with water. - Stash the to-go size in your gym bag to quickly wash off sweat and dirt after a workout without drying your skin. - For a deeper cleanse, start with Fresh Soy Face Cleanser to remove impurities and makeup and rinse.
